question: 1. What is the use of notch:

answers.a: To measure rate of flow through a small channel
answers.b: To measure pressure of liquid through the small channel
answers.c: To measure the velocity of liquid through the small channel

question: 2. In a trapeziodal channel, when is the discharge maximum?

answers.a: top width is twice the sloping side
answers.c: half of top width equals the sloping side
